      • attack

        public boolean attack(int attackTerritory,
                      int attackTroops,
                      int defendTerritory,
                      int defendTroops)
        Parameters:
        attackTerritory - the territory that troops are attacking from
        attackTroops - the number of troops of the attackingTerritory that are attacking the defendingTerritory
        defendTerritory - the territory that troops are defending
        defendTroops - the number of troops in the defendingTerritory that are defending from the attackingTerritory
        Returns:
        true if the attack was successful, false otherwise
